# packageVersion

## Summary

Identify the version of a package.


## Description

A packageVersion is useful for identification purposes and for indicating later
changes of the package version.


## Metadata

`https://spdx.org/rdf/3.0.1/terms/Software/packageVersion`

|---|---|

| Nature | DataProperty |
| Range | xsd:string |
